text:
──...Now, onto the next question. I heard that this time,
the costumes are matching for all 283 Production members.

Do you have any thoughts
on everyone wearing the same design?
──I feel like we need to move more dynamically.

While unit costumes often have different designs
for each member, that's not the case this time.

I need to be all like "Oh that's Mitsumine!" when they
see all of us coming together.

So all more for me to perform with more clarity and appeal!
It really fires me up!

(...It's obvious, but you can see just how serious she is
when she isn't folling around....──)

I'll always give it my all,
aiming to captivate the entire audience!
